page.title: 01Carlisle - Regional Centre
page.content: Our survey area includes most of the City's "raisons d'etre". It is a comm- unications centre with the main West Coast{Railway}and the{M6}approaching their crossings of the{River Eden}. Industry such as{Metal Box}followed the railway, and the{Borderway Auction {Mart}rests against an M-way junction. Carlisle is an administrative centre with local government based in the{ {Civic Centre}and the Courts. The{Post {Office}sorts mail for N & W Cumbria and S Scotland. The City is a commerc- ial, tourist, and recreational centre. It is proud of two new developments costing many millions: the{Sands Leis- {ure Centre}and the{Lanes}shopping com- plex. The annual{Great Fair}attracts tourists and critics; the{Covered {Market}perhaps seeks a new role; and { {United}fans may drown their sorrows in ex-State{pubs}or the{Baths}.
